name: AVAudioSpatializationFormats
desc: A structure that defines the spatialization formats that a player item supports.

items.name: static var monoAndStereo: AVAudioSpatializationFormats
items.desc: A value that indicates the player item only supports mono and stereo layouts for audio spatialization.

items.name: static var multichannel: AVAudioSpatializationFormats
items.desc: A value that indicates the player item only supports multichannel layouts for audio spatialization.

items.name: static var monoStereoAndMultichannel: AVAudioSpatializationFormats
items.desc: A value that indicates the player item supports mono, stereo, and multichannel layouts for audio spatialization.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Initializes a format with a string value.
